html:
Senior Collaborative Games Development and Testing

This module challenges you to take a role in a team of specialist developers towards making a project across two semesters. Junior members will be partnered with one or more senior team leaders drawn from the level 6 (third-year students), who are tasked with leading the team.

Learning Objectives:

+ View junior objectives

+   Work effectively as in individual within a project team to produce a game.

+   Reflect on their own personal skills and critical attributes valuable to a team.

+  Consider a range of established techniques and select an appropriate one to provide solutions to problems.

+  Communicate within a team as junior members towards a common goal.

+ View senior objectives

+   Work effectively in a lead role for a project team to produce a game.

+  Reflect on their own personal skills and critical attributes valuable to a team in their role as leader.

+  Consider a range of established techniques and select an appropriate one to provide solutions to problems as they present.

+  Lead team members towards a common goal within the scope of their discipline.

Module Content:
